data.name: The Forbidden Book
data.detailed_description:
The hero of this adventure is Beatrice, a student who goes to the university library in search of valuable information.
Help Bea in her journey to reach the most remote rooms of the library, which are delayed well beyond the allowed time, and avoids the guardians.
It will not be easy to recover the forbidden book.

This DLC contains a new whole pixel art game, the plot of which is connected with the main story of the Snake Bird.

Warning: the game is in Italian.

data.short_description: "Il libro proibito" is an exploration and adventure game in which you have to help the main character fulfill her mission: to retrieve information and knowledge. Warning: the game is in Italian.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Any GPU that supports DirectX 9.0 or better
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
